title: 新人求助（进服务器游戏崩溃）
author: ZGSsan
txt_content:
有些服务器(如play.mcbbs.net）进去游戏崩溃显示：

Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      
Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Unexpected error
This error has been saved to D:\minecraft\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2012-12-22_01.34.13-client.txt for your convenience. Please include a copy of this file if you report this crash to anyone.

--- BEGIN ERROR REPORT b970301a --------
Generated 22.12.12 1:34
- Minecraft Version: 1.3.2
- Operating System: Windows XP (x86) version 5.1
- Java Version: 1.7.0_05, Oracle Corporation
- Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) Client VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation
- Memory: 56631696 bytes (54 MB) / 97050624 bytes (92 MB) up to 1060372480 bytes (1011 MB)
- JVM Flags: 4 total; -Xincgc -Xmx1024m -XX:PermSize=64m -XX:MaxPermSize=128m
- ModLoader: Mods loaded: 2
ModLoader 1.3.2
mod_ReiMinimap v3.2_05 [1.3.2]
- LWJGL: 2.8.4
- OpenGL: ATI Radeon HD 4350 GL version 2.1.8305 Release, ATI Technologies Inc.
- Is Modded: Very likely
- Type: Client
- Texture Pack: Default
- Profiler Position: N/A (disabled)
java.lang.NullPointerException
 at asv.a(NetClientHandler.java:562)
 at cn.a(SourceFile:97)
 at bb.b(SourceFile:333)
 at asv.d(NetClientHandler.java:89)
 at atd.b(SourceFile:51)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.l(SourceFile:1261)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.J(SourceFile:583)
 at net.minecraft.client.Minecraft.run(SourceFile:535)
 at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
--- END ERROR REPORT 757e709b ----------
但是好像是进去之后才崩溃的，就是刚刚看到左下一些服务器公告之类的就直接崩溃。
而且有一些服务器还是可以进去的。。。

replies.author: t9044
replies.txt_content:
重新下载客户端
服务器要什么版本的客户端 你电脑上的也要一样··

replies.author: ZGSsan
replies.txt_content:
t9044 发表于 2012-12-22 01:46 
重新下载客户端
服务器要什么版本的客户端 你电脑上的也要一样··
嗯，好的知道了。O(∩_∩)O谢谢
